Hydrogen Fuel Cell

Album cover design

Graphic Design   

Between 2014 and 2017, I worked as a freelancer on fiverr.com, creating album covers for independent artists. I was commissioned to create over 200 album covers, with an average satisfaction rating of 4.9/5 (136 reviews). Artists for whom I designed album covers include Neffex who now have over a billion views on YouTube, and hundreds of millions of streams on Spotify.

Because most artists generally had a tight budget, I had to be very creative in my use of typography and stock images, using very little elements to create unique and interesting covers which would accurately reflect the song(s) they were designed for.
